author: adagov.org
title: ₳GOV: Funded Proposer Experience
description: With exponential volume of proposals and proposers, auditing projects becomes unscalable if conducted manually.
solution: Build a platform in which proposers can create a project space, provide project updates and manage and report project status socially.
experience: Funded F4, F5, F6. 1 x Systems Engineer, 1 x Social Designer, 1 x Project Manager and we maintain and run members.cardanocatalyst.io
